duties_responsibilities.duty: Work cross-functionally with Plant Engineering, PD, Vehicle Program Engineers, and the Quality Office to manage actions to improve current model quality.
Maintain Process Sheets, PFMEAs, and Process Initiatives, and report out and maintain records for the items associated with their program content.
Manage positive progress for their team’s content, identifying roadblocks and connecting engineers to necessary resources.
Leverage their own experience and network to build up team members, share lessons learned, and document necessary changes for specifications and Forward Model Planning.
Support the implementation of core group specific strategies, confirm alignment with standards, and assist in the development and management of roadmaps to deliver objectives.
Represent the company at internal and external events to address manufacturing controllable items based on plant internal quality indicators.
Provide quality-related information/data to Advanced Feasibility group.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Engineering or a related field (Master's preferred)
